## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves
Describe the problem this feature would solve. Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...]

## Proposed Solution
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case
Describe the use case or scenario where this feature would be helpful.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.

## Is this related to a Future Feature?
Check if this matches any of the features listed in the [Future Features](https://github.com/gabriel1ll7/Seating-Planner#-future-features) section of the README.
